name: Soda Girls
description: 《Soda Girls》 is a horizontal version of the cartoon action game, game player by setting their own unique combo, against crazy zombies, save companion. If you don't think the game is tough enough, you can upgrade the monster gene (What the hell?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz single core or faster processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000  or later DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3.0 Ghz multi core or faster processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650  or later DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
